mapper.select:
select name, target_id AS targetId, course_id AS courseId, weight, ( SELECT name FROM archive_target t2 WHERE t1.target_id = t2.id ) AS targetName, ( SELECT name FROM archive_first_knowledge t3 WHERE t1.course_id = t3.id ) AS firstKnowledgeName, ( SELECT grade FROM archive_target t2 WHERE t1.target_id = t2.id) AS grade, weight_explain AS weightExplain, creator, version, updater FROM archive_assess t1 WHERE deleted = 0
and name like concat('%',#{query.name},'%')
and ( SELECT grade FROM archive_target t2 WHERE t1.target_id = t2.id) = #{query.grade}
and ( SELECT name FROM archive_target t2 WHERE t1.target_id = t2.id ) like concat('%',#{query.targetName},'%')
and ( SELECT name FROM archive_first_knowledge t3 WHERE t1.course_id = t3.id ) like concat('%',#{query.firstKnowledgeName},'%')
